meals.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
meals.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with ground beef, tomatoes, onions, and garlic served over spaghetti.

meals.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
meals.description: Grilled chicken chunks marinated in spices and yogurt, served in a rich, creamy tomato sauce.

meals.name: Sushi
meals.description: Vinegared rice served with raw or cooked seafood, vegetables, and seaweed. A Japanese staple.

meals.name: Beef Tacos
meals.description: Tortillas filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and a variety of sauces.

meals.name: Pad Thai
meals.description: Stir-fried rice noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, eggs, peanuts, and bean sprouts. Popular street food in Thailand.

meals.name: Falafel
meals.description: Deep-fried balls of ground chickpeas or fava beans, usually served in pita bread with vegetables and tahini.

meals.name: Cheeseburger
meals.description: A grilled beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and onions, served in a bun.

meals.name: Ratatouille
meals.description: A stewed vegetable dish consisting of eggplant, zucchini, tomatoes, and peppers in a flavorful herb sauce.

meals.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
meals.description: A fresh salad made with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

meals.name: Butter Chicken
meals.description: A rich, creamy dish of tender chicken cooked in a spiced tomato sauce with butter.

meals.name: Pizza Margherita
meals.description: A simple Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and olive oil.

meals.name: Pho
meals.description: A traditional Vietnamese noodle soup with broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat, typically beef or chicken.

meals.name: Paella
meals.description: A classic Spanish dish made with rice, saffron, seafood, chicken, and vegetables.

meals.name: Moussaka
meals.description: A layered casserole of eggplant, ground beef, and b√©chamel sauce, baked to golden perfection.

meals.name: Shakshuka
meals.description: Poached eggs cooked in a spicy tomato and pepper sauce, often served with bread.
